CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT( Priority ), "Rush", "1", "Normal", "2", Null) & "-" & TEXT( Priority )& "-"& TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ) ) ) &"/"& TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ) ) ) &"/"& TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ) ) )&"/"& TEXT( TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate ) )
CustomField.label: Case List View Sort
